net.objectzoo.ebc

Interface SendsSignal

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ProcessAndSignalFlow<ProcessParameter>, StartAndSignalFlow
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JoinSignals, ProcessAndSignalBase, ProcessAndSignalBoard, SignalBase, SignalBoard, SplitProcessToSignal, SplitSignal, StartAndClearThreadLocalStateStore, StartAndSignalBase, StartAndSignalBoard

    public interface SendsSignal
    An EBC that SendsSignal is capable of sending a signal when it's work completes to subscribed listeners and thus provides an Event0 to do so.
    Author:
    tilmann

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      net.objectzoo.events.Event0 signalEvent()
      Provides an Event0 that is used to send the work completed signal of this EBC

    • Method Detail

      • signalEvent

        net.objectzoo.events.Event0 signalEvent()
        Provides an Event0 that is used to send the work completed signal of this EBC
        Returns:
        the signal event of this EBC
